lines.text: Don't make the same mistakes I did.
You couldn't find a dinosaur at the bottom of a whiskey glass.
I want you to not find the monster. I want you to use state of the art equipment to prove that it's not there.
I'm a joke. I'm the guy who chases Looney Tunes.
The only thing I got from my grandmother was bad eyes.
Oh no, I think you have nice e...
Uh, what I meant was that I'm far-sighted.
